Lovepop | Boston | Full Time | ONSITE

We're hiring for numerous tech/prod positions, notably: - Senior Full Stack - Dev Ops (req is not up yet) - Data Analyst/Engineering - Visual/UI/Product Design

You can see all our roles at: https://www.lovepopcards.com/pages/jobs

I'm Max, and I head up product at Lovepop. we combine hardcore engineering with paper to make amazing 3D greeting cards and invitations. We're building a customization engine on top of of our product and are building out a team around it. We closed a $6m A round in November and have a very fast growing, surprisingly large e-commerce/direct-to-consumer business.

Our interview process starts with screening directly with myself or our head of engineering, depending on the role may involve a (small!) piece of homework and a few hours with various members of our team. We don't believe in coding whiteboards!

Reach out with q's! max (at) lovepopcards.com
